name: strava-statistics
description: Statistics for Strava is a self-hosted analytics dashboard for Strava athletes. It imports activities and displays advanced stats, charts, and trends.

features.title: Data Import
features.description: Syncs all activities from Strava account automatically

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Calculates detailed metrics beyond Strava's native analytics

features.title: Gear Tracking
features.description: Monitors equipment usage and mileage across activities

features.title: Heatmaps
features.description: Visualizes activity routes on interactive maps

features.title: Personal Records
features.description: Tracks PRs for segments, distances, and elevation

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Compares performance across different years and periods

features.title: Challenge Tracking
features.description: Monitors progress toward custom distance or time goals

features.title: Eddington Number
features.description: Calculates cycling and running Eddington numbers
